name: monorepo
description: Monorepo containing l2p, VideoVault, payment, and vllm projects

scripts.build:all: cd l2p && npm run build:all && cd ../VideoVault && npm run build && cd ../payment && npm run build && cd ../vllm && npm run build
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "l2p-fe,l2p-be,vault,payment,vllm" -c "green,blue,yellow,magenta,cyan" "cd l2p && npm run dev:frontend" "cd l2p && npm run dev:backend" "cd VideoVault && npm run dev" "cd payment && npm run dev" "cd vllm && npm run dev:watch"
scripts.dev:all:web: concurrently -n "l2p-fe,l2p-be,vault,payment" -c "green,blue,yellow,magenta" "cd l2p && npm run dev:frontend" "cd l2p && npm run dev:backend" "cd VideoVault && npm run dev" "cd payment && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:l2p:parallel: cd l2p && concurrently -n "frontend,backend" -c "green,blue" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: cd l2p && npm run install:all && cd ../VideoVault && npm install && cd ../payment && npm install && cd ../vllm && npm install
scripts.test:all: cd l2p && npm run test:all && cd ../VideoVault && npm run test:all && cd ../payment && npm test
